roleset.name: anger
roleset.note: INCENSE-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from incense.01-v)

example.name: incensed by
example.text: News of the legislative veto appeared in the New Orleans papers , and [Henry and William]-2 became incensed [*-2]by the fact that they had not been told [*-1] of the attempt in advance .
example.arg: by the fact that they had not been told [*-1] of the attempt in advance

example.name: incensed over
example.text: One such group got all incensed over shelled `` children '' when Helva was just turning fourteen [*T*-1] .
example.arg: when Helva was just turning fourteen [*T*-1]
